website_summaries.verdict: A versatile four-sided grater, featuring three different grate sizes and a slicer. Offers excellent value for money.
pros: The handle has a comfortable grip that's easy to hold firmly while you grate
The range of shred sizes, plus the slicing option gives you plenty of choice, whether you're grating cheese or prepping veggies
cons: Some users find the grater to rust quickly if not dried properly after use

customer_reviews.title: Works well but poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: The grater works well. I have only used the soft cheese side so far but it does a good job of quickly shredding cheddar and similar cheeses. I have two issues with the design. First, there is a rubber frame around the base to keep the grater from sliding. Unfortunately cheese gets in between the rubber frame and the grater's body making it difficult to clean. The frame can be removed but this requires some force and is a bit risky since the grater's surfaces are covered in sharp edges. The second issue is the steel rod that goes around the base of the grater to make it rigid. It is carbon steel rather than stainless. It rusts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Metal Parts NOT 100% Stainless Steel
customer_reviews.text: As a couple of other reviewers have stated, this grater has a rod around the bottom of the grater that is NOT stainless steel. The non-skid rubber leaked rusty black water when I took it out of the dishwasher. I took the rubber piece off and could see that the rod running through the bottom is already rusted! Saying that it is 100% stainless steel is very deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: Kackerr

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY! I just used it 2-3 times but I just realized it got immediately rusty! I am so disappointed! I am returning this..please see the picture..
customer_reviews.author: mdeepsea07

customer_reviews.title: Base is not stainless steel, and it rusts.
customer_reviews.text: Under the rubber base is a carbon (not stainless) steel support rod that rusts. This is not acceptable in a tool that should be 100% stainless — I haven’t even used it and it’s rusted from the first wash.
customer_reviews.author: T. Payne

customer_reviews.title: rusted
customer_reviews.text: I have barely had this unit a month. I've washed it maybe 3 times and it is rusting on the bottom. The plastic covers the rust but it is still there. Not very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Cusinart CTG-00-BG Boxed Grater was a good thing to buy
customer_reviews.text: Cusinart CTG-00-BG Boxed Grater was a good thing to buy. Stable, reliable, easy to use. It's a classical model. A nice rubber handle and bottom frame made it pleasant to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_guy

customer_reviews.title: Rusted After One Use
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely disappointed with this product. While the grater was easy to use, it rusted after one run through the dishwasher. Total waste of money since I threw it out after using it once.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good basic grater .. every home should have one.
customer_reviews.text: A good grater. Thick metal. Standard grater. Easy to use. Nothing fancy. Nothing to break. It works. Hold the grater by the handle and push the cheese or potatoes or zuchini or whatever you are grating across and then put in dishwasher to clean. Cuisinart is as good brand and a reliable one. This is something I think every kitchen should have.
customer_reviews.author: Prime user Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Rusted after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Have had this shredder for 4 months and it has rusted. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Wilsonman1

customer_reviews.title: Used three times and fell apart.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor construction. Unit fell apart at the seam. Was not welded properly. Very hard to completely clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan Kowacich

customer_reviews.title: so it had to be sharp and strong enough to get the job done easily. Till now have been able to grate carrots
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for a week and no complaints so far! I mainly wanted a grater for hard vegetables, so it had to be sharp and strong enough to get the job done easily. Till now have been able to grate carrots, ginger, raw mango easily with little effort. The hand grip on the top and the rubber base at the bottom ensure that you can place it an angle of your convenience and it doesnt slip away!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashok G

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for grating larger amounts of cheese
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time when I am grating larger portions of cheese. I grate more of my own cheese since I learned that store bought grated cheese has some weird additives (wood shavings, basically to preserve). I like the rubber grip at the top, it’s easy to stock in the dishwasher after, and does the job well. I have a smaller grater that I use for smaller amounts of cheese (parmesan on Italian food, for example), but you could use this for smaller amounts as well if you wish.
customer_reviews.author: BoxesEveryday

customer_reviews.title: A very good basic grater.
customer_reviews.text: There are 9000 kinds of graters out there.... and I had an old one that finally broke from so much use. I replaced it with this one. So far I am very happy with this model. For the following reasons... 1. It did not cost a lot of money. 2. Gets the job done without a struggle, the handle and rubber base helps keep this grater stable while you are using it. 3. Easy clean up... quick rinse under the faucet, and into the dishwasher. Very good value for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Helomech

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT attempt to wash by hand
customer_reviews.text: Only get this product if you have a dishwasher. My apartment does not have one and each time I hand-wash the grater I cut myself on the one side - I don't known what to call that side's cutting strategy, so I just call them death spikes- see photo. I have no need to use the death spikes in the course of food preparation but obviously I have to handle the entire item when cleaning. I had to cover the side with the death spikes with duct tape to avoid cutting myself again. Beware the death spikes.
customer_reviews.author: NancyMc

customer_reviews.title: RUST RUST RUST. Unfit for food.
customer_reviews.text: This “stainless steel” grater is held together with a corrosive wire. Lots of rust after the first washing. Dangerous for your food. Shame on you Cuisinart. I’m returning it today.
customer_reviews.author: Artbelles

customer_reviews.title: Started Rusting after first use
customer_reviews.text: The grater itself is a bit flimsy, but not enough of an issue for me to return it. The much bigger issue is that the wire at the base of the grater, under the rubber, is not at all rust-proof. The rubber is not tightly sealed against the based and so water/food bits easily get into the gap between the rubber and non-stainless wire at the base, and from there the rust quickly formed. On the second use I noticed rust flaking off, and had to return this. I'll look more closely at the reviews on other graters, this one was just way too cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: greengold1200

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the little extra price compared to what I had before.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent grater. Sharp, heavy. Plastic on handle and bottom of grater so it doesn't slip. First one I've had that was actually sharp enough to grate things quickly and easily. Only had it a few weeks. Hope it stays sharp, have already used it more than I used my previous grater iin 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Why

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Plain and simple and does what its supposed to do. I don't understand all the negative reviews for this on here. And as to having rust on the bottom...all you have to do is pull off the plastic from the bottom edge and it cleans and dries nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Alla

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy, a bit larger than the older ones, I like that
customer_reviews.text: The handle with the rubber grip is a huge plus over the older metal handle style. I also like that its a bit larger than the older ones also. The rubber takes some work to get it off so you can clean it. My kids loved it.
customer_reviews.author: THXkid61

customer_reviews.title: Groovy!
customer_reviews.text: I almost live in my kitchen. I have several different applicances to grate and slice food items, but sometimes it's nice to have the simple, basic gadgets. I love Cuisinart brand and this did not let me down. The quality is excellent as I expect when I purchase Cuisinart. This is sturdy and solid. The rubber grip and bottom make for easy use as it does not slip on my granite counters and allows me to be able to hold steady as I am grating cheese or veggies. Easy to clean! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: FlyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Like a lot of graters, it wont be easy to clean the inside of it.
customer_reviews.text: Ive had graters like this before and although it takes forever PLUS a day to clean, graters as strong as this one can be very practical if you cook a lot and can last a long time. However, since this one was a gift, i wont be using it but its very sturdy and well made for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge grater
customer_reviews.text: First of all this thing is huge, but I’m sure it says that somewhere so that was my bad just be aware. The silver piece on the handle fell of the first week we got it so now it always holds water during washes which I don’t like. Otherwise, it is a good grater.
customer_reviews.author: =D M

customer_reviews.title: Rust Trap, Avoid
customer_reviews.text: My grater rusted beyond use within a couple months. I have not experienced anything like this with my other other metal grating or zesting utensils/tools..
customer_reviews.author: Z. Gompers

customer_reviews.title: widely spaced holes = more work for less grating
customer_reviews.text: The holes on our old grater had were much closer together, which meant a lot more carrot got cut with each pass. Thus one feels like you're mostly rubbing it along smooth steel while a few bits get grated. Also, although I knew this when I ordered it, not having a bottom makes the whole process a lot messier.
customer_reviews.author: Erin S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The cuisinart products are really good, it is a trusted brand. This grater is also excellent quality. The steel blade is really sharp and I love how easy it is to grate!! The base is sturdy so it would not slip or fall, overall I am really happy with the purchase and would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Kavita

customer_reviews.title: Nice Grater
customer_reviews.text: I had not had a grater in several years. We usually buy the grated cheese, already. Trying to cook healthier, we needed a grater. I love the wide handle and the rubber lip at the bottom that prevents slipping. I love making zucchini fritters now that I have this grater!
customer_reviews.author: El Juegador

customer_reviews.title: Another Kitchen Essential!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. The grater is very sturdy on a counter top as well as a plate, given it's wide bottom. The grip handle is ergonomic and large and makes for easy use. The grater easily fits in the dishwasher for quick and fuss-free cleanup! Cuisinart doesn't disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: cedoubleu

customer_reviews.title: Metal Cuisinart Logo
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened the box, the metal Cuisinartlogo on top of the handle fell out of the plastic bag. I placed it back in but I think that's pretty shoddy. I only bought this model because I saw it was endorsed by America's Test Kitchen. Can't always trust what you see on TV.
customer_reviews.author: Leo G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product with a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a while now and have to say I'm really glad I purchased it. The handle in top is easy to hold and allows the rest pressure to hold it in place. I've hand washed it and even put it in the dishwasher a few time. In any case make sure its good and dry especially around the base.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp and cuts my fingers every time i use. Its so uneven that even if you by mistake touch it your hands will cut.
customer_reviews.author: Debarati chakravarty

customer_reviews.title: Bent and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived smashed-- obviously flimsy material. Amazon box was not damaged so I know it wasn't the delivery person's fault. Sent back for a refund and will not be purchasing another.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Okay But Not Great
customer_reviews.text: It's adequate but not stellar. The grating should be almost effortless with a box grater but it's not so in that sense I'm a little disappointed. It's adequate but not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Raburn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed at quality control
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived bent--I liken it to a large dent on the corner of the thinner/finner grate. I cam tell it seems to be good quality but how quality is it if it bends that easily in shipping. The box showed no damage so it must have been bent prior to shipping. My impression is POOR quality control. Still works for grating but I don't want a brand new grater to be bent out of shape... disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Alanna Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Grates great!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this overall. This style grater is large and you need something like a plate to grate onto, but it’s the best for grating large amounts. Great for cheese, carrots, anything you need. Sharp and sturdy. Easier to clean than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: ethan819

customer_reviews.title: Middle of the Road
customer_reviews.text: The handle combined with the non-slip bottom are a nice upgrade from my previous one. The one downside is the smaller grate is on the side and not one of the main panels. I use the finer shred weekly, so for me, I prefer for it to have a larger panel.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Non-slip base not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The non-slip base is difficult to clean unless you remove it, which is somewhat unpleasant to do because of the sharp rasp surface. More importantly, after about 1.5 years, the base has torn.
customer_reviews.author: Read

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This cheese grater is very sturdy and doesn't rock and fall over as you're trying to grate cheese. It has a nice handle that even my mom (who has arthritis) can use without pain. I love the different types of grating it can do. Definitely worth the value, and as always it arrived very quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Fun, thrifty, and thriving

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart Comes In Clutch Again!
customer_reviews.text: This cheese shredder is everything I could of hoped for. I love to put mozzarella on every dish and this makes it easy to do. It shreds the cheese to the perfect size and is perfectly easily to clean. I recommend this to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, I am so please
customer_reviews.text: My first one was a cheap version and it cracked in the center No chance of that happening on this one, I hit the big time now, that I am able to own this grater Well done ! Fettuccini Alfredo here I come !
customer_reviews.author: PAUL J

customer_reviews.title: Expectations exceeded
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved this item. It is very sturdy. Not flimsy at all. All the cutting edges are set at perfect angles and are plenty sharp. The removable base makes for easy cleaning of the nooks and crannies. Reminds me of the grater my granny had since before time.
customer_reviews.author: Knice

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sturdy grater. I love the handle to help hold it while grating. And the black padded bottom piece is really nice. It is non slip so you wont accidentally slide it off the counter if your grating something with some extra enthusiasm. This is the nicest stand up grater I have ever had. I really enjoy using it. It has not shown one sign of rusting or bending at all. It will last a long time. It is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Looks nearly new after months
customer_reviews.text: The thing I love the most is that it is not rusting or tarnishing even after I left it in water overnight by accident one time. The base and handle are still firm an sturdy. I use it to shred cabbage and hard cheeses. Works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee

customer_reviews.title: This is the best grater...
customer_reviews.text: My mom has the Japanese Mandoline slicer (which is razor sharp), but this box grater is so much safer and just as effective!!! I love the rubber base (it makes a difference!!) and I like how I can make home made hashbrowns every morning. I'm on a "all natural" diet these days, meaning, I won't eat anything processed at all. I've been eating anything I want as long as if it's REAL, and let me tell you, my home made hashbrowns really are guilt-free! This is a great product, and I use it everyday! UPDATE: 6 years later and this grater is really fantastic! Great quality!!
customer_reviews.author: KoalaJoanne

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have a grater again
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality piece of kitchen equipment. HOWEVER, I do not remember coming so close to slicing my finger so many times when I was kid. Maybe because my hands were smaller?
customer_reviews.author: Anna1953

customer_reviews.title: Better grater out there
customer_reviews.text: It’s not easy to use and makes a mess. I’m used to the single handled one. I’ve cut my finger on this one and am afraid to use it now. I used it 4 times for eggs and once for cheese
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Sayers

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean!
customer_reviews.text: This works so much better than the grater I was using before I purchased this one. It takes little to no effort and washes very easily as well. I recommend hand washing since (as with any cheese grater) the cheese will stick on the inside but I'm able to clean it fairly easily.
customer_reviews.author: Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This does the job(s) it’s needed for and is bigger than my old one / helpful when trying to grate larger items. About as easy to clean as any other grater. That said, I do wish there was a cover with it as seems like every time I reach into the cupboards I scrape my hand on it.
customer_reviews.author: K Geer

customer_reviews.title: Good function, decent build
customer_reviews.text: It's your basic grater with a nice handle. I fear it will bend eventually, as it's a bit thin, especially the handle. But it works nicely for now. The rubber trim on the bottom is a nice touch. It keeps it sturdy on the surface, and it also allows you to tap it clean without damaging anything.
customer_reviews.author: silver

customer_reviews.title: Just like Mom's
customer_reviews.text: I have a food processor which is great for large amounts. For 1/2 cup amounts, I needed a hand held box grater. This is PERFECT! I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Marie H

customer_reviews.title: Sharp grater but rusted REALLY fast
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the fact that this grater starter rusting less than 2 weeks after I got this. I hand wash it, so it hasn't seen the inside of a dishwasher. And I always let it air dry in a drying rack. However, it started rusting very soon after purchase. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My only complaint is that the seal along the bottom holds water.
customer_reviews.text: The bottom lip of it holds water whether you hand or dish wash it and it's hard to remove it to dry off the grater. Other than that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality grater, I’ve owned others that have snapped while grating something but this one feels thick and sturdy. Used a few times and it’s been great so far.
customer_reviews.author: aduh

customer_reviews.title: Unless you like rust in your food, do not buy this.
customer_reviews.text: NOT stainless steel. After a single run through of the dishwasher the rod that runs around the base completely rusted out making this product completely useless and dangerous to use for food. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: hard to go wrong with this
customer_reviews.text: Our old grater started dropping pot rivets into the salad as we grated :( - this is the upgrade and nice to hold, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: D. Platt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome box grater!
customer_reviews.text: Seen the shelter in place, been cooking a lot more. And this works wonders! Works as intended and grates cheese and potatoes no problem.
customer_reviews.author: SynysterDragun

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Fancy
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable to hold or manage as I was expecting. It is difficult to find a good position to hold the grater in... the handle looks improved, but it’s only benefit it accommodating larger hands. The black rim on the bad is also a hard plastic... something I did not expect.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Love My New Grater!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using one of those flat graters for years now and decided to upgrade to a boxed grater. I picked a good one! The Cuisinart Boxed Grater is sturdy, the molding around the base help keep it in place and the handle fits nicely in my hand. I have no smell coming from the handle (I checked!). Caution - the grating surfaces are sharp, but I like that in a grater!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri K

customer_reviews.title: Not great for grating vegetables
customer_reviews.text: After reading so many positive reviews, I was looking forward to grating carrots for lentil soup that I have made so many times using an old grater that is no longer available to me. It was very hard to remove grated carrots, and I got a lot less carrots than what I used to get using the plain old grater... Also, it was harder to clean it... I wish I still had the old one!! If I could I would return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Hana K

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great basic grater. I used it for many things this past holiday season and it was up to the challenge and held up to everything I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: SAG

customer_reviews.title: Coming apart at one of the edges.
customer_reviews.text: After only a few uses, mine is coming apart where two of the sides meet. I have never left a bad review for anything but this is unacceptable!
customer_reviews.author: Armen Merjanian

customer_reviews.title: works fine
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted. It works a lot better and is easier to use than the kind that will not stand on its own. Be careful though, it is very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM C MORAN JR

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done!
customer_reviews.text: Nice box grater. Have only used it a couple of times but so far so good. Be sure to take the bottom rubber grip off when cleaning as cheese and other foods you grate get under there and need to be cleaned out so it doesn't build up and cause a bacterial issue. Let the rubber dry thoroughly before replacing...
customer_reviews.author: Barb H

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. I asked him about it after he had it for a week, and he says he uses it all the time, it cuts well and he really likes it. I offered to trade him for my flat one but he said No way lol.
customer_reviews.author: Pernicious

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just used this tonight and she loved it. Was fast and easy to use. She grated a hard cheese for dinner
customer_reviews.author: Korinne

customer_reviews.title: So much easier to use than my old box grater...
customer_reviews.text: I was trying one of Chef AJ's recipes (Overnight Muesli). I loved the muesli, but grating the apple was a royal pain. So I ordered this grater hoping it would work better than the one I had. And it does, it's fantastic!!!! The next time I made the "Overnight Muesli", grating the fruit was apple was so easy. Yes, I would most definitely recommend this grater. And Chef AJ's recipes...
customer_reviews.author: Sunluvr

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Best grater I've ever had! Works beautifully! I have ran it through the dishwasher numerous times and no rust!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well,  easy to clean,  handle is a bonus!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Cleans easily in the dishwasher. Handle is the best feature. Big enough for a hand but not too big that it gets in the way. Comfortable fit. Grater works well.
customer_reviews.author: madalena Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grater
customer_reviews.text: I've used cheaper box graters in the past and never liked them much. Decided to take a chance on this and couldn't be happier with it. Heavy duty and holds it's shape. The handle is strong and ergonomic.
customer_reviews.author: EspressoLover

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little bit difficult to clean without tearing up my sponge but it does the job for shredding cheese and potatoes, which is why I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Billie LaMarche

customer_reviews.title: Turns cheese into smaller cheese.
customer_reviews.text: What else do you want it to do? Came as an add-on, so it was super cheap. Rubber grip and base make it reliable for vigorous cheesing. Rubber base is kind of a pain to clean, but only because I am lazy. Not really the grater's fault.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Schell

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Works well and easy to clean. Love the grip at the base and on the handle a real comfort to use and stay in place while grating.
customer_reviews.author: ghostrider

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty good. It's sturdy and sharp enough to make cutting easy.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie My Lady

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this cheese grater!! It’s exactly what in wanted. However it came missing a piece in the handle. It still works though so I still have it 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Dani Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you paid for. Wobbly, uncomfortable, the rubber thing is kind of pointless since it will be a headache to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Arutyunyan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for months now and it still looks the same contrary to other graters I purchased in the past, most important for me is that it doesn’t accumulate food in the seems which creates an unsanitary grater.
customer_reviews.author: Keyla

customer_reviews.title: It rusts
customer_reviews.text: It rusts. It has a carbon steel wire that holds the bottom of the grater together and it rusts. Unsanitary and poorly designed.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this grater because of its ease of using and clean up. I actually have two because I couldn’t find the original one after moving.
customer_reviews.author: ASUMirage15

customer_reviews.title: Multiple grades, convenient
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and easily grates things in multiple sizes plus a zester. Harder to clean without a brush but a lot safer and more convenient that single size hand held grater.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Grater
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome cheese grater. Easy to hold, grip, and use.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This works as advertised, but it's somewhat difficult to handle. Used to grate cheese and other vegetables and the sharpness holds up well. Almost too sharp, as I cut my thumb due to the difficulty in handling. My have been more so my fault as my hands were wet. All in all, a good product to get done what needs to get done quicker and for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love this over my old grater
customer_reviews.text: This grater is much easier to handle. It feel much more stable as I am grating a large block of cheese on it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven O

customer_reviews.title: Nicely designed
customer_reviews.text: Finally got tired of Mom's rusty old box grater from the 1940s. This one is nicely designed - a pleasure to use. And no rust!
customer_reviews.author: M. Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Durable and versatile
customer_reviews.text: This is sturdy and easy to use I like that it has the four different sides seems durable
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item since I usually really like the design, function, and durability of Cuisinart products. This is a great product- sturdily made, and gets the job done quite well. It has one slight flaw, as a previous poster noted already. The 'nonslip' rubber ring around the bottom traps small bits of food and is not very easy to clean. I really like the nonslip feature, but it needs future improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Erin B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Finish & Quality
customer_reviews.text: I compared these to less expensive models at Walmart and am pleased that I decided to purchase the Cuisinart on Amazon. It has a heavier and higher quality feel than less expensive models and I like the rubber handle and grommet at the bottom for protection of hands and surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love! I had the original version and it broke after many years of live. This new and improved version has a comfortable handle and still does the same great job as the one I am used to. Easy cleanup, absolutely amazing.
customer_reviews.author: morgan

customer_reviews.title: Rust
customer_reviews.text: Th inside lining under the rubber piece isn’t stainless steel so it’s rusting and getting in our food. It’s a waste of a purchase. Unfortunately, I wasn’t aware of this issue until after the return window so it will be going in the trash. Easy to use and handle but as you can see in the picture it’s rusting so I don’t recommend buying this one.
customer_reviews.author: The girl with the forehead tattoo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We are really glad that we got this product. Replaced an hand held model.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Stamps

customer_reviews.title: Great for your basic grating needs
customer_reviews.text: Basic grater. I have had not problems. I routinely put it in the dishwasher, which cleans it really well without tearing up my sponge. I have used it with cheese and citrus fruit. Make sure that it is actually clean before putting away, as there can be buildup that requires a sponge to get off.
customer_reviews.author: HannahTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: cooking
customer_reviews.text: I like that it stays in one spot and also strong but it doesn't allow you to cut slices so small
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Nice box grater
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice grater, it grates stuff, heavier and sharper than the cheapie I've been using.
customer_reviews.author: tr

customer_reviews.title: Solid handle and slip resistance.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my dad for the holidays as he always makes grated potatoes for Christmas breakfast. He was thoroughly impressed with the handle's comfortable grip and the slip resistance the bottom provided. Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and goes straight into the dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: Lu Anne

customer_reviews.title: This grater is strong and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I buy cheese in bulk and use the grater as I need. It grates carrots and most veggies very well.
customer_reviews.author: Alfreda McLane

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp
customer_reviews.text: Much sharper than the kind you might find in department stores. Excellent SS finish makes it easy to clean, too.
customer_reviews.author: mockturtle

customer_reviews.title: Big grater but great
customer_reviews.text: I had never used a grater before but this worked out perfectly for large cheese wheel pieces. I like it but my only complaints would be its hard to find a good storage.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Easy too use!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time. Works Great! Very Happy! Easy to use and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Willliams

customer_reviews.title: Best cheese grater I've ever known
customer_reviews.text: Best cheese grater I've ever known. I've only used it twice, but it's really high quality. I had a cheap one from Wal-Mart or Target before this, and I really do notice a difference. Much higher quality product ava saves time in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: T. A.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this cheese grater durable, love the handle. Will recommend to family.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Bustillos

customer_reviews.title: Grate it, don't cut it
customer_reviews.text: This is a typical cheese grater. I took off one star because the rubber bottom is more of a hassle than anything else and it just gets in the way. I also think it would fall off eventually since it's just slipped on rubber.
customer_reviews.author: sgbolt

product_meta.title: Cuisinart Boxed Grater, Black, One Size
product_meta.description: Color:BlackTo slice, grate or shred foods, The stainless box grater with its nonskid base does the job. Soft grips make food prep a pleasure.
feature_bullets: 4 Sides to slice, grate or shred foods
